text:
@piersmorgan Huge failure from Government.
Didn’t close the borders quickly,allowed Coronavirus patients to spread all over the UK. 
Didn’t prepare to tackle the pandemic.
Dither and delay and now thousands dying even when not counting the nursing home patients (government won’t test them).
